channel.title: Php url registration
channel.description:
hello, I'm making a client for users to register. I need help with making a url registration for example: www.xtremekilling.net/register?username=TEST&password=TEST
I will try to offer a prize.
Thank you all. I've been searching for days and days.

item.title: Php url registration
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

first i would not know why you would want to go that use “post” in your form because users wont like that (easily get hacked) and how are you planing on registering using a DB?

Read full topic
